data.name: Dried-Out ARC Resin
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or Activities. Can be recycled into plastic.

data.name: Duct Tape
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.name: Durable Cloth
data.description: Used to craft medical Supplies such as Herbal Bandage and Sterilized Bandage.

data.name: Electrical Components
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials.
data.flavor_text: Used to craft: Tactical Mk.2, Combat Mk.2, Looting Mk.2, Advanced Electrical Components, Surge Shield Recharger

data.name: Empty Wine Bottle
data.description: Yes, it really is empty.

data.name: Energy Clip
data.description: Ammo used for energy weapons. One clip will fully charge a single weapon.

data.name: Equalizer
data.description: A high capacity experimental beam rifle.
data.flavor_text: Extremely effective against ARC armor plating and limbs

data.name: Equalizer Blueprint
data.description: A high capacity experimental beam rifle.

data.name: ESR Analyzer
data.description: A portable analyzer from the world before, complete with several spare tubes.

data.name: Exodus Modules
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.
data.flavor_text: Used to craft: Tempest, Vulcano, Hullcracker, Bobcat, Snap Hook

data.name: Expired Pasta
data.description: Way pasta its prime.

data.name: Expired Respirator
data.description: The filters are clogged with sand and noxious fumes. Long past its lifespan.

data.name: Explosive Compound
data.description: Used to craft explosives.

data.name: Explosive Mine
data.description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and explodes, dealing damage to anything within its radius.

data.name: Explosive Mine Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Explosive Mine

data.name: Extended Barrel
data.description: Moderately increases bullet velocity.

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Anvil, Arpeggio, Burletta, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Bettina, Bobcat, Tempest

data.name: Extended Barrel Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft an Extended Barrel

data.name: Extended Light Mag I
data.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

data.name: Extended Light Mag II
data.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

data.name: Extended Light Mag II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Extended Light Mag II

data.name: Extended Light Mag III
data.description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

data.name: Extended Light Mag III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Extended Light Mag III

data.name: Extended Medium Mag I
data.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo.

data.name: Extended Medium Mag II
data.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo

stat_block.compatibleWeapons: Arpeggio, Osprey, Renegade, Torrente, Tempest, Venator

data.name: Extended Medium Mag II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Extended Medium Mag II

data.name: Extended Medium Mag III
data.description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo.

data.name: Extended Medium Mag III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft the Medium Mag III

data.name: Extended Shotgun Mag I
data.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use shotgun ammo.

data.name: Extended Shotgun Mag II
data.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use shotgun ammo.

data.name: Extended Shotgun Mag II Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Extended Shotgun Mag II - Moderately extends the ammo capacity of shotguns.

data.name: Extended Shotgun Mag III
data.description: Significantly extends the ammo capacity of shotguns.

data.name: Extended Shotgun Mag III Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Extended Shotgun Mag III

data.name: Fabric
data.description: Used to craft medical supplies and shields.

data.name: Faded Photograph
data.description: A snapshot of the world before, faded by sunlight and time.

data.name: Familiar Duck
data.description: Unlike the real one, this one fits in your pack
data.flavor_text: Can be thrown to create noise.

data.name: Ferro I
data.description: Heavy break-action rifle. Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Ferro II
data.description: Heavy break-action rifle. Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Ferro III
data.description: Heavy break-action rifle. Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Ferro IV
data.description: Heavy break-action rifle. Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Fertilizer
data.description: May be worth a few coins.

data.name: Film Reel
data.description: May be worth a few coins.

data.name: Fine Wristwatch
data.description: Perfect for telling the time, and showcasing that you're an exceedingly dignified person.

data.name: Fireball Burner
data.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.name: Firecracker
data.description: A device that sparks and pops in a pleasant manner.

data.name: Fireworks Box
data.description: A remotely triggered arrangement of dazzling fireworks, sure to put on a show

data.name: Fireworks Box Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Fireworks Box

data.name: Flame Spray
data.description: A classic makeshift weapon, sure to leave scorch marks.

data.name: Flashy Duck
data.description: Lovingly hand-painted by someone of great talent-clearly. Any guesses who?
data.flavor_text: Can be thrown to create noise.

data.name: Flow Controller
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.name: Flushing Terminal Key
data.description: A pungent key used to operate the Flushing Terminals in the tunnels below Spaceport
